articles.author: Michael Brendan Dougherty, Michael Brendan Dougherty
articles.title: The Coronavirus Plague and Social Media
articles.description: Navigating the outbreak in a world of endless unverified information

articles.author: Tobias Hoonhout, Tobias Hoonhout
articles.title: U.S. Temporarily Bars Foreigners Who Have Recently Visited China from Entering U.S. to Prevent Coronavirus Outbreak
articles.description: The White House coronavirus task force announced Friday that it was enacting a public health emergency in the wake of the virus’s outbreak, which so far has resulted in six confirmed cases in the U.S.

articles.author: Zachary Evans, Zachary Evans
articles.title: Delta and American Airlines Suspend All Flights to China amid Coronavirus Outbreak
articles.description: Delta and American Airlines announced on Friday they would suspend all flights between the U.S. and China, following the outbreak of the Wuhan coronavirus.

articles.author: Mairead McArdle, Mairead McArdle
articles.title: State Dept. Raises China Travel Advisory to Highest Threat Level over Coronavirus
articles.description: "Travelers should be prepared for travel restrictions to be put into effect with little or no advance notice," the State Department said.
